00041 class CSwordModuleSearch {
00042 public:
00043     /***
00044         * Contains the search scope for the module or for all modules.
00045         * If module is NULL the scope is applied to all modules.
00046         */
00047     struct SearchScopeStruct {
00048         QString lowerBound;
00049         QString upperBound;
00050         CModuleInfo* module;
00051     };
00052     typedef QList<SearchScopeStruct> ListSearchScopeStruct;
00053 
00054     enum scopeType {
00055         Scope_NoScope,
00056         Scope_LastSearch,
00057         Scope_Bounds
00058     };
00059   enum searchOptions {
00060     exactPhrase     = 0x000000001,
00061     multipleWords   = 0x000000002,
00062     regExp              = 0x000000004,
00063     caseSensitive   = 0x000000008,      
00064     useLastResult   = 0x000000010,
00065     useScope            = 0x000000020
00066     };
00067     enum percentType {
00068     currentModule   = 0x000000001,
00069         allModules      = 0x000000002
00070     };
00071 
00072     CSwordModuleSearch();
00076     ~CSwordModuleSearch();
00080   void setSearchedText( const QString );
00084   bool startSearch();

00092   void setSearchScope( CSwordModuleSearch::ListSearchScopeStruct* );
00096   void useSearchScope( bool useIt );
00100   void useLastSearchResult( bool useIt );
00104   void resetSearchScope();
00108   void interruptSearch();
00112   bool foundItems();
00116   bool isSearching();   
00121     void startSearchThread(void);
00126   void setSearchOptions( int options );
00130   int getPercent( percentType type );
00131     void percentUpdate(char percent, void *p);
00132
